prompts: Create a Normal-type Pokemon with a long pink tongue and a round body.
I want a Pokemon that has a playful personality and loves to lick everything.
Generate a creature that is cute, pink, and has a big mouth for eating.
Make a Pokemon with a unique body shape and a large, protruding tongue.
Imagine a Pokemon that thrives in urban environments and has a friendly demeanor.
Design a Pokemon that resembles a cuddly creature with a fun-loving attitude.
Give me a Pokemon that has rounded features and is known for its quirky habits.
